about: My name is Zhao zhihe, which represents the expectation that me becoming a notable person in my family. On the way of undertaking the arduous task, I have been working hard and gradually found my interest in the research or career area, which will be depicted in detail below. Concerning to daily life, I am a Saxophone amateur who has a keen on jazz and a crazy fan of the NBA team, Cavalier, who possesses the most consequential superstar player on the ground, LeBron James.
